title: Strengthens Restrictions on Advanced Computing & SME
summary: Updates to October 2022 controls; expands entity list; foreign direct product rule

title: Strengthens Export Controls
summary: Adds controls incl. HBM; new red-flag guidance; entity list additions

title: Strengthens Restrictions; Advanced Computing Semiconductors
summary: Updates prior controls; expands license requirements incl. for foundries/OSAT

title: Rescission of AI Diffusion Rule
summary: Rescinds Jan 13, 2025 diffusion rule; replacement forthcoming

title: Closes Export Controls Loophole for Foreign-Owned Fabs in China
summary: Ends license-free VEU for certain foreign fabs; licenses required; limits upgrades
